entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Wainwright
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Wainwright 07:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: -20.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -22.4°C
Wind: W 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Fog. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog becoming fog patches near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Fog. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches becoming fog early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022
